short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay organized. Check off assignments like a todo-list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize your school life and motivate yourself with Homework Checker. Keep track of your complete/incomplete Schoology assignments by checking them off. Learn more at joelgrayson.com/software/homework-checker or see the open-source code at github.com/JoelGrayson/Homework-Checker


===Privacy Policy===
Homework Checker does not and will never collect any data. It is fully-transparent: you can see the source code at github.com/JoelGrayson/Homework-Checker
